channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- GetYourGuide Ticketing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- GetYourGuide Ticketing

item.title: CVE-2022-3609|2024-08-03T01:14:02.093Z -- unknown -- getyourguide%20ticketing
item.description: The GetYourGuide Ticketing WordPress plugin before 1.0.4 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
